text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cqfmeasures/CodeSystem/identifier-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
version-independent Version IndependentThe version independent globally unique identifier (guid) for the measure.
version-specific Version SpecificThe version specific globally unique identifier (guid) for the measure.
short-name Short NameThe short name identifier for the measure (e.g. CMS104v8).
endorser EndorserThe version-independent endorser identifier for the measure (e.g. 0002).
publisher PublisherThe version-independent publisher identifier for the measure (e.g. 104).

name: MeasureIdentifierType
title: Measure Identifier Type Codes
description: Identifier types for a measure (e.g. version-independent, version-specific, short-name, endorser, publisher)

concept.definition: The version independent globally unique identifier (guid) for the measure.
The version specific globally unique identifier (guid) for the measure.
The short name identifier for the measure (e.g. CMS104v8).
The version-independent endorser identifier for the measure (e.g. 0002).
The version-independent publisher identifier for the measure (e.g. 104).
